block.p: EPRIMUS CREDIT TECHNOLOGIES, New York, named Joseph P. Bauman to the new post of chief executive. He had been managing director and head of derivatives sales and structuring for North America at the Bank of America, San Francisco.
KAPLAN INC., New York, named Eric Cantor president at Kaplan Professional. He had been senior vice president and general manager at the F.W. Dodge division of the McGraw-Hill Cos.

EPRIMUS CREDIT TECHNOLOGIES, New York, named Joseph P. Bauman to the new post of chief executive. He had been managing director and head of derivatives sales and structuring for North America at the Bank of America, San Francisco.
KAPLAN INC., New York, named Eric Cantor president at Kaplan Professional. He had been senior vice president and general manager at the F.W. Dodge division of the McGraw-Hill Cos.

LILLIAN VERNON CORP., Rye, N.Y., a catalog and online retailer, named Kevin Green, executive vice president for merchandising, marketing and online operations, president. He succeeds Jonah Gitlitz, a board member, who has been acting president since December 1998.
